name: Colorful Mayhem
introduction:
◆ Event Rules ◆
● "Colorful Mayhem" consists of two modes: "Double Seals" and "Best of the Flock," each with its own independent points and ranking system.

◆ "Double Seals" Gameplay Intro ◆
● In "Double Seals" mode, you can deploy up to 6 baby seals per match.
● Deployed baby seals are divided into "Combat Position" and "Assist Position."
● Baby seals in "Combat Position" can enter the field for collision battles.
● Baby seals in "Assist Position" only provide additional ability effects.
● Trailblazers can freely combine "Combat Position" and "Assist Position" to create powerful seal formations.

◆ "Best of the Flock" Gameplay Intro ◆
● In "Best of the Flock" mode, 30 players participate in each match.
● This mode has no move limit. Trailblazers must clear fruits and power up their birds within the time limit.
● After each cycle, trailblazers whose current power is below the target will be eliminated. In the entire match, each trailblazer has only one chance to avoid elimination.
● During the match, Bubble Express containing Battle Items will randomly appear. Clear adjacent fruits to pop the bubbles and obtain the items inside.

◆ Event Rewards ◆
● During the event, reach the designated rank point total between the two modes to claim rewards from "Limited-Time Rewards."
